title: Sketchbook Folio, "Venus and Cupid and Satyr, Study after Correggio", 1813–18
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower margin: 37 Coregio Parigi
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Antiope reclines at center, apparently asleep. Beside her is sleeping Cupid with quiver of arrows. Satyr embracing reeds, looks at  from the upper left corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Venus and Cupid and Satyr, Study after Correggio", 1813–18.
1813–18. Pen and brown ink, brush and dark brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3506.
